# UIActivityIndicatorView.Style.large

**Case**

The large style of indicator.

## Declaration

```swift
case large
```

## Constants

- **UIActivityIndicatorView.Style.medium**: The default activity indicator style.
- **UIActivityIndicatorView.Style.whiteLarge**: The large white style of indicator.
- **UIActivityIndicatorView.Style.white**: The standard white style of indicator.
- **UIActivityIndicatorView.Style.gray**: The standard gray style of indicator.
